description: This file defines the EcsService class, which manages AWS ECS services, including creation, reading, updating, and deletion of ECS services, with support for network configuration, load balancers, and other ECS-specific parameters.

classes.name: EcsService
classes.description: Represents an AWS ECS Service, providing methods to create, read, update, and delete ECS services with detailed configuration options.

methods.name: get_ecs_service_name
methods.description: Returns the ECS service name, defaulting to 'name' if 'ecs_service_name' is not set.

methods.name: get_ecs_cluster_name
methods.description: Returns the ECS cluster name, resolving if 'cluster' is an EcsCluster object.

methods.name: get_ecs_task_definition
methods.description: Returns the task definition family or ARN, resolving if 'task_definition' is an EcsTaskDefinition object.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates the ECS service in AWS, configuring network, load balancers, and other parameters.

methods.name: post_create
methods.description: Waits for the ECS service to become stable after creation if 'wait_for_create' is True.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads the current state of the ECS service from AWS.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the ECS service from AWS.

methods.name: post_delete
methods.description: Waits for the ECS service to be fully deleted if 'wait_for_delete' is True.

methods.name: _update
methods.description: Updates the ECS service with new configuration parameters.
